modules.description: This module offers Redis-compatible operations for asynchronous key-value interactions, supporting strings, lists, sets, and serialized data. It enables bit-level manipulation of strings, atomic integer operations with overflow control, set algebra (union, intersection, difference), and key lifecycle management with expiration policies. Designed for scenarios like caching, real-time analytics, and distributed state management, it handles high-throughput workloads with async I/O and Redis command emulation.
